Html:
Hi Everyone,

I recently tried GMap.NET with different map tile server settings. It seems that in US and EU, Google and Bing Map match each other quite well. However when i moved the map to China, i.e. Shanghai, a significant different between GoogleMap and BingMap can be recognized.

You can test it with this location:
31.2398662550348, 121.499669551849

I am not sure if this is a bug of GMAP or a conflict between Google and Bing projection.

Any idea is appreciated.

Bill
